sentence.Network_en: Mrs. Ackerman made an interjection again.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿克曼太太又一次插嘴.

sentence.Network_en: In grammar , an interjection is a word or a phrase used to express a strong feeling.
sentence.Network_cn: 文法中,感叹语是用来表达一种强烈感情的单词或短语.

sentence.Network_en: A word which can express an exclamation, a call or a response is called an interjection.
sentence.Network_cn: 叹词是表示感叹、呼唤、应答的词.可以表示惊讶、赞美 、 埋怨、叹息等感情.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin interjectio(n-), from the verb interjicere (see interject)

entry.def: An interjection is something you say which interrupts someone else who is speaking.

example.ex: ...the moronic and insensitive interjections of the disc jockey.
example.tran: 电台音乐节目主持人既白痴又不顾及他人感受的插话

entry.def: In grammar, an interjection is a word or expression which you use to express a strong feeling such as surprise, pain, or horror.

means.word_mean: 1. an abrupt emphatic exclamation expressing emotion
2. the action of interjecting or interposing an action or remark that interrupts

auth_sentence.content: Plus, of course, the occasional interjection of cuica.
auth_sentence.res_content: Plus, of course, the occasional interjection of cuica.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Plus, of course, the occasional interjection of cuica.

auth_sentence.content: Every guitar interjection makes a point.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Every guitar interjection makes a point.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ab离开+ject抛→抛掉→可怜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 形容词的,用作形容词的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad增加+ject投掷,扔+ive……的→扔上去的,附加的
deject[v.使沮丧, 使灰心]+ed表形容词→adj.沮丧的,失望的
object[n.物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语 v.[to]反对]+ive……的→客观的[词性变化:作名词,表示"目标,目的"]
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题
ad增加+ject投掷,扔+ive……的→扔上去的,附加的
eject[v.投出,掷出]+ion表名词→n.喷出, 排出物
inter在……中间+ject投掷,扔+ion表名词→在句子中间扔出的字→感叹词

stems_affixes.value_cn: 物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语
stems_affixes.word_buile: ob逆,反+ject投掷,扔→反着扔→反对→引申为扔向目标

stems_affixes.value_cn: [to]反对,异议,不喜欢,反对的理由
stems_affixes.word_buile: object反对+ion表名词→n.[to]反对,异议,不喜欢,反对的理由
object[n.物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语 v.[to]反对]+ive……的→客观的[词性变化:作名词,表示"目标,目的"]
pro向前+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
project[v.投射出;n.工程项目]+ile物体→向前扔的物体
project[v.投射出;n.工程项目]+ion表名词→n.射出,投射;计划
re回+ject扔回来→拒绝
reject[v.拒绝,抵制,丢弃,排斥,退掉 n.落选者]+ion表名词→n.退回,拒绝
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题
subject[n.主题;学科 adj.隶属的;易遭..的 v.使隶属]+ion表名词→n.征服
subject主观+ivity表名词→n.主观性, 主观
tra穿+ject投掷,扔+ory范围→扔出去穿过的范围→弹道轨道
con共同+ject投掷,扔+ure表名词→大家一起扔[思想]→推测
de向下+ject投掷,扔→情绪向下扔→沮丧
e出+ject掷→掷出
in进入+ject投掷,扔→扔进去→注射
ob逆,反+ject投掷,扔→反着扔→反对→引申为扔向目标
pro向前+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
